meanings.definition: Feeling or showing extreme annoyance or irritation.
meanings.sent1: She was the pissiest person in the room when her favorite show got canceled.
meanings.sent2: The customer gave the pissiest look to the waiter after waiting for too long.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat looked pissiest when it saw the new puppy playing with its toys.
meanings.sent4: His face turned pissiest like a storm cloud about to burst with rain.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's voice sounded pissiest when the students wouldn't stop talking.

meanings.sent1: The pissiest toy in the store broke as soon as it was played with.
meanings.sent2: The old car was the pissiest one on the lot, barely running.
meanings.sent3: The sandwich tasted pissiest, like it had been sitting out for days.
meanings.sent4: The costume looked pissiest, with seams coming apart before the party even started.
meanings.sent5: The paint job was pissiest, with streaks and missed spots everywhere.

meanings.sent1: He needed to pissiest urgently after drinking a whole bottle of water.
meanings.sent2: The dog always pissiest on that specific tree during their walks.
meanings.sent3: The toddler decided to pissiest in the sandbox instead of the toilet, much to the parents' dismay.
meanings.sent4: The athlete had to pissiest behind a bush during the marathon race.
meanings.sent5: She had to pissiest in the bushes during the camping trip since the restroom was too far away.
